text: package cmd
doc_head: package cmd
summary_en: This package contains command-line interface functions for managing user data

text:
import (
	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/data_processor"
	"strings"
	"time"

	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/scraper"
	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/serve"

	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
	"github.com/spf13/viper"
)
doc_head:
import (
	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/data_processor"
	"strings"
	"time"
	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/scraper"
	"go.impalastudios.com/aviation/liveflights/cmd/serve"
	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
	"github.com/spf13/viper"
)
summary_en: Initializes and manages command-line interface for live flight data processing

text:
// RunRootCmd entrypoint of the root command
func RunRootCmd() error {
	viper.AutomaticEnv()
	viper.SetEnvKeyReplacer(strings.NewReplacer(".", "_", "-", "_"))

	cmd := &cobra.Command{
		Use:     "liveflights",
		Short:   "[Aviation] Live Flights Service",
		Version: "1.0.0",
	}

	cmd.AddCommand(serve.New())
	cmd.AddCommand(scraper.New())
	cmd.AddCommand(data_processor.New())

	cmd.PersistentFlags().Bool("logging.debug", false, "Whether to emit debug level logs or not.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("logging.encoding", "json", "The log encoding strategy.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().StringP("app.name", "n", "[Aviation] Live Flights", "The application name.")

	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.access-key-id", "", "The AWS access key ID.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.secret-access-key", "", "The AWS secret access key.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.session-token", "", "The AWS session token.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.endpoint-url", "", "The AWS endpoint.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.region", "", "The AWS region.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Bool("aws.s3.use-path-style", false, "Whether to use path style URLs when calling S3 APIs.")

	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.name", "live_flights", "DB name for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.host", "localhost", "Host name for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.user", "root", "User for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.password", "example", "Password for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Int("mongodb.port", 27019, "Port for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.replica-set", "rs0", "Replica set name for the database")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("mongodb.uri", "", "URI for the database")

	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("cache.host", "localhost", "The cache host.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Int("cache.port", 6379, "The cache port.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("cache.user", "default", "The cache user.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("cache.password", "", "The cache password.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Duration("cache.ttl.default", 7*(24*time.Hour), "The default ttl for cache items.")

	_ = viper.BindPFlags(cmd.PersistentFlags())

	return cmd.Execute()
}
doc_head:
// RunRootCmd entrypoint of the root command
func RunRootCmd() error {
	viper.AutomaticEnv()
	viper.SetEnvKeyReplacer(strings.NewReplacer(".", "_", "-", "_"))
	cmd := &cobra.Command{
		Use:     "liveflights",
		Short:   "[Aviation] Live Flights Service",
		Version: "1.0.0",
	}
	cmd.AddCommand(serve.New())
	cmd.AddCommand(scraper.New())
	cmd.AddCommand(data_processor.New())
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Bool("logging.debug", false, "Whether to emit debug level logs or not.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("logging.encoding", "json", "The log encoding strategy.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().StringP("app.name", "n", "[Aviation] Live Flights", "The application name.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.access-key-id", "", "The AWS access key ID.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.secret-access-key", "", "The AWS secret access key.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.session-token", "", "The AWS session token.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.endpoint-url", "", "The AWS endpoint.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().String("aws.region", "", "The AWS region.")
	cmd.PersistentFlags().Bool("aws.s3.use-path-style", false, "Whether to use path style URLs when calling S3 APIs.")
summary_en: Initializes root command for Live Flights Service with subcommands and persistent flags

type enrichMetrics struct {
	totalCalls      int
	totalEnriched   int
	totalFailed     int
	totalSkipped    int
	missingFlightID int

	airlineNotFound          map[string]int
	departureAirportNotFound map[string]int
	arrivalAirportNotFound   map[string]int

	lastReport time.Time
}

type airline struct {
	ID             string  `json:"id"`
	Designator     string  `json:"designator"`
	ICAO           *string `json:"icao,omitempty"`
	IATA           *string `json:"iata,omitempty"`
	Classification int64   `json:"classification"`
}

	Classification int64   `json:"classification"`
}
